target.name: Target
target.description: A list of room(s) to send the message to.

data.name: Data
data.description: Extended information of notification. Supports list of images. Supports message format. Optional.

trust_blacklist_device.name: Trust or Blacklist device
trust_blacklist_device.description: Trust or blacklist devices belonging to a user, a specific user and device combination, or all devices.

user_id.name: User ID
user_id.description: The full user id of the user including the home server of the user to modify. This is required if using device_id or apply_all_user_devices.

device_id.name: Device ID
device_id.description: The device id associated with the user to trust. This is typically 10 uppercase characters. This is optional if using apply_all_devices or apply_all_user_devices.

apply_all_devices.name: Apply all devices
apply_all_devices.description: Apply this action to every device belonging to every user.

apply_all_user_devices.name: Apply all user devices
apply_all_user_devices.description: Apply this action to every device belonging to the specified user_id.

blacklist.name: Blacklist
blacklist.description: Use the blacklist action instead of trusting.
